channel.title: Account files are DAT files
channel.description:
Hey everyone, im still a noob when it comes to coding private servers, im still learning.
so, im using a source right? and all the account files save as DAT files and i cant edit any accounts, i dont know why... ive tried to figure it out.. but i cant, like i said, im still a noob at this :P
Heres a pic, just incase u dont know what i mean: [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2yobv3q.png[/img]
So if anyone has any idea why it does this, or if anyone can help me fix this, id really appreciate it!

item.title: Account files are DAT files
item.dc:creator: @Tatemo Tatemo
item.description:
@Tatemo wrote:

This is a better way.

Edit them via commands. (Not the best way to edit them but it is easy and you can remove/comment out commands once done editing)
